title: New Comfortable BBQ Pit Area, Dishwasher, Laundry Care Center
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Professional Bilingual Staff', '-New Playground!', '-Near Public Transit', '-Ceiling Fan', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-Disposal', '-Hard Surface', 'Flooring With 4.5 Inch Base Boards', '-Private Patio', '-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Patio/Balcony', '-Laundry Care Center', '-Large Closets', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
